bibl.title: O. Mons Claudianus 13 (ZPE 62, 1986, 71 ff.).
bibl.note: Edd.: Hélène Cuvigny et Guy Wagner, Ostraca grecs du Mons Claudianus. ZPE 62 (1986) pp. 71-73 et pl. II. - The text suits the situation of Pheres remonstrating with Admetus after the death of Alcestis.
bibl.seg: Handley Eric Walter, O. Mons Claudianus 13 (ZPE 62, 1986, 71 ff.).

Edd.: Hélène Cuvigny et Guy Wagner, Ostraca grecs du Mons Claudianus. ZPE 62 (1986) pp. 71-73 et pl. II. - The text suits the situation of Pheres remonstrating with Admetus after the death of Alcestis.
